Text:
Worked great for me. 

Clean, great instructions. 

Perfect upload. 

Kentucky kid is on my Top Shelf List.

To confirm, this worked perfectly for me on Windows 7 64 bit. I think it is 32 bit (not sure) but it worked great. I tried all the other ones - 4.0.1164, 1139 etc etc, none worked. 

HEre's what I did. 

Installed the .msi
unchecked the 'launch SmartFTP now' at the end of the install. 
Ran the patch (avast asked if it should be in the sandbox, but I ran it in the normal mode)
Browsed to the smartftp folder in program files(x86) and selected the .dll file. 
Patch was successful. 
Started up SmartFTP.

what version is it

ultimate or professional.
